When you cast Wild Guardian, you gain {1} charges of Dream Guide. 

Wild Guardian's echoes are now cast at {2}% effectiveness, and each echo {3} additional times over {4} sec.
desc:1673748765: Mastery increased by {1}%. Maul is always empowered and deals {2}% additional Nature damage over {3} sec.
desc:1861677438:
After you cast Berserk or Incarnation: Guardian of Ursoc, you gain access to Wild Guardian:
|T7636529:24|t {ffffffff|Wild Guardian}:
Spirits of the wild come to your aid, causing your next {1} [plural|cast|casts] of Ironfur, Maul, and Frenzied Regeneration to be echoed at {2}% effectiveness.
